title: Ticket #7434: Additional Manual Links at Read the Docs
description:
The OSG would like a stable link to the latest version of the manual within a release series. Adding a V8_8 tag that tracks the latest 8.8 manual and a V8_9 tag that tracks the latest 8.9 manual. We will take the old manual down when the release series goes out of support.

Also, add documentation to the release procedure to update these tabs and build the manuals on read the docs.
creator: tim
